titles.title: A bill to reduce Federal budget deficits by delaying the beginning of initial low-rate production of two new weapon systems of the Department of Defense.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10576)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Prohibits funds available for the Department of Defense for FY 1994 from being expended for proceeding into low-rate initial production: (1) during FY 1995 for the Tri-Service Standoff Attack Missile program; and (2) under the Javelin Antitank Weapon System-Medium program.
